name: CryptoSMT
tagline: An easy to use tool for cryptanalysis of symmetric primitives based on SMT/SAT solvers.
body:
### Welcome to CryptoSMT Pages.
This page gives an overview of how to install CryptoSMT and how to use it.

### Installing
CryptoSMT invokes two other tools and needs to know the paths to the executables:

* STP: https://github.com/stp/stp
* CryptoMiniSat: https://github.com/msoos/cryptominisat

Currently no install script is used and you can simple add the paths by adding them to the _main.py_

## Python Libraries
If you need to install YAML:
```
$ pip install pyyaml
```
or
```
$ sudo apt-get install python-yaml
```

### How to use?

### Authors and Contributors
Stefan Koelbl (@kste)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with using the tool or want to suggest a certain feature? Open an issue at https://github.com/kste/cryptosmt/issues or contact the author.
